CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;Elisabeth Steiner;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE , a town in LOC .
CARDINAL . As a victim of GPE , the applicant is entitled to benefits . Considering herself underpaid , she brought CARDINAL sets of proceedings against the local welfare authority .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG awarded the applicant arrears and legal costs in the amount of MONEY ( RUB ) . This judgment became binding on DATE and was partly enforced on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG awarded the applicant more arrears in the amount of RUB PERSON . This judgment became binding on DATE and was enforced on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG awarded the applicant arrears in the amount of RUB CARDINAL , and on DATE the appeal court in addition fixed a new amount of periodic payments . This judgment became binding on DATE and was enforced on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG awarded the applicant arrears in the amount of RUB CARDINAL . This judgment became binding on DATE and was enforced on an unspecified date .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG awarded the applicant arrears in the amount of RUB CARDINAL . This judgment became binding on DATE and was enforced on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG also awarded the applicant further arrears in the amount of RUB CARDINAL and fixed a new amount of periodic payments . This judgment became binding on DATE and was enforced on an unspecified date .

CARDINAL . On the applicant ’s request , on DATE and DATE ORG compensated the applicant ’s inflationary loss caused by the delayed enforcement of the judgments in the total amount of RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL .
CARDINAL . Under section CARDINAL of LAW of DATE , a bailiff must enforce a judgment within DATE . Under section QUANTITY of LAW of DATE , ORG must enforce a judgment within DATE .
